   22: -module(ssh_sftp_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -export([
   25:          suite/0,
   26:          all/0,
   27:          groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          end_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_group/2,
   31:          end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_testcase/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: -export([
   37:          ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar/1,
   38:          ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar/1,
   39:          async_read/1,
   40:          async_write/1,
   41:          big_file_to_tar/1,
   42:          binaries_to_tar/1,
   43:          block_size_16_crypto_tar/1,
   44:          block_size_1_crypto_tar/1,
   45:          create_empty_tar/1,
   46:          directory_to_tar/1,
   47:          file_owner_access/1,
   48:          files_chunked_to_tar/1,
   49:          files_to_tar/1,
   50:          links/1,
   51:          mk_rm_dir/1,
   52:          null_crypto_tar/1,
   53:          open_close_dir/1,
   54:          open_close_file/1,
   55:          pos_read/1,
   56:          pos_write/1,
   57:          position/1,
   58:          read_crypto_tar/1,
   59:          read_dir/1,
   60:          read_file/1,
   61:          read_null_crypto_tar/1,
   62:          read_tar/1,
   63:          remove_file/1,
   64:          rename_file/1,
   65:          retrieve_attributes/1,
   66:          set_attributes/1,
   67:          sftp_nonexistent_subsystem/1,
   68:          sftp_read_big_file/1,
   69:          simple_crypto_tar_big/1,
   70:          simple_crypto_tar_small/1,
   71:          start_channel_sock/1,
   72:          stuff/1,
   73:          unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar/1,
   74:          unstuff/1,
   75:          version_option/1,
   76:          write_big_file/1,
   77:          write_file/1,
   78:          write_file_iolist/1
   79:         ]).
   80: 
   81: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   82: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   83: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   84: 						% Default timetrap timeout
   85: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(1)).
   86: 
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   89: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   90: 
   91: suite() ->
   92:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   93:      {timetrap,{seconds,40}}].
   94: 
   95: all() -> 
   96:     [{group, not_unicode},
   97:      {group, unicode}
   98:     ].
   99: 
  100: 
  101: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  102:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
  103:        begin
  104: 	   ct:log("file:native_name_encoding() = ~p,~nio:getopts() = ~p",
  105: 		  [file:native_name_encoding(),io:getopts()]),
  106: 	   ssh:start(),
  107: 	   Config
  108:        end).
  109: 
  110: end_per_suite(_onfig) ->
  111:     ssh:stop().
  112: 
  113: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  114: groups() -> 
  115:     [{not_unicode, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  116: 			{group,openssh_server},
  117: 			{group,big_recvpkt_size},
  118: 			sftp_nonexistent_subsystem]},
  119: 
  120:      {unicode, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  121: 		    {group,openssh_server},
  122: 		    sftp_nonexistent_subsystem
  123:                    ]},
  124: 
  125:      {big_recvpkt_size, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  126: 			     {group,openssh_server}]},
  127: 
  128:      {erlang_server, [], [{group,write_read_tests},
  129: 			  version_option,
  130: 			  {group,remote_tar}]},
  131: 
  132:      {openssh_server, [], [{group,write_read_tests},
  133: 			   {group,remote_tar}]},
  134: 
  135:      {remote_tar, [], [create_empty_tar, 
  136: 		       ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar,
  137: 		       ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar,
  138: 		       unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar,
  139: 		       files_to_tar,
  140: 		       big_file_to_tar, files_chunked_to_tar,
  141: 		       directory_to_tar, binaries_to_tar, null_crypto_tar, 
  142: 		       simple_crypto_tar_small, simple_crypto_tar_big,
  143: 		       read_tar, read_null_crypto_tar, read_crypto_tar, 
  144: 		       block_size_1_crypto_tar, block_size_16_crypto_tar
  145: 		      ]},
  146: 
  147:      {write_read_tests, [], [open_close_file, open_close_dir, read_file, read_dir,
  148: 			     write_file, write_file_iolist, write_big_file, sftp_read_big_file,
  149: 			     rename_file, mk_rm_dir, remove_file, links,
  150: 			     retrieve_attributes, set_attributes, file_owner_access, async_read,
  151: 			     async_write, position, pos_read, pos_write,
  152: 			     start_channel_sock
  153: 			    ]}
  154:     ].
  155: 
  156: init_per_group(not_unicode, Config) ->
  157:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  158:     {ok,TestDataDir} =
  159:         make_data_sub_dir(Config, "test_data", "test_data_not_unicode"),
  160:     [{user, "Alladin"},
  161:      {passwd, "Sesame"},
  162:      {data, <<"Hello world!">>},
  163:      {data_pos, ["Hej ","hopp"]},
  164:      {filename,     "sftp.txt"},
  165:      {testfile,     "test.txt"},
  166:      {linktest,     "link_test.txt"},
  167:      {tar_filename, "sftp_tar_test.tar"},
  168:      {tar_F1_txt,   "f1.txt"},
  169:      {datadir_tar, TestDataDir}
  170:      | Config];
  171: 
  172: init_per_group(unicode, Config) ->
  173:     case have_unicode_support() of
  174: 	true ->
  175: 	    ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  176:             {ok,TestDataDir} =
  177:                 make_data_sub_dir(Config, "test_data", "test_data_高兴_unicöde"),
  178:             populate_non_unicode(TestDataDir),
  179: 	    NewConfig =
  180: 		[{user, "åke高兴"},
  181: 		 {passwd, "ärlig日本じん"},
  182:                  {data, "foobar å 一二三四いちにさんち"},
  183:                  {data_pos, ["中","国"]},
  184: 		 {filename,     "sftp瑞点.txt"},
  185: 		 {testfile,     "testハンス.txt"},
  186: 		 {linktest,     "link_test語.txt"},
  187: 		 {tar_filename, "sftp_tar_test一二三.tar"},
  188: 		 {tar_F1_txt,   "F一.txt"},
  189: 		 {tar_F3_txt,   "f3.txt"},
  190: 		 {tar_F4_txt,   "g四.txt"},
  191: 		 {datadir_tar, TestDataDir}
  192: 		 | Config %% lists:foldl(fun(K,Cf) -> lists:keydelete(K,1,Cf) end,
  193: 			  %%      Config,
  194: 			  %%      [user, passwd, data,
  195: 			  %%       filename, testfile, linktest,
  196: 			  %%       tar_filename, tar_F1_txt, datadir_tar
  197: 			  %%      ]
  198:                           %%     )
  199: 		],
  200: 	    FN = fn(proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt,NewConfig), NewConfig),
  201: 	    case catch file:read_file(FN) of
  202: 		{ok,FN_contents} ->
  203: 		    ct:log("Readable file:read_file(~tp) ->~n~tp",[FN,FN_contents]),
  204: 		    NewConfig;
  205: 		Other ->
  206: 		    ct:log("Unreadable file:read_file(~tp) ->~n~p",[FN,Other]),
  207: 		    {skip, "Not unicode file reading"}
  208: 	    end;
  209: 
  210: 	_ ->
  211: 	    {skip, "Not unicode file encoding"}
  212:     end;
  213: 
  214: init_per_group(big_recvpkt_size, Config) ->
  215:     [{pkt_sz,123456} | Config];
  216: 
  217: init_per_group(erlang_server, Config) ->
  218:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  219:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  220:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  221:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  222:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  223:     Sftpd = {_, HostX, PortX} =
  224: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  225: 			     {user_dir, PrivDir},
  226: 			     {user_passwords,
  227: 			      [{User, Passwd}]}]),
  228:     [{peer, {fmt_host(HostX),PortX}}, {group, erlang_server}, {sftpd, Sftpd} | Config];
  229: 
  230: init_per_group(openssh_server, Config) ->
  231:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  232:     Host = ssh_test_lib:hostname(),
  233:     case (catch ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host,
  234: 				       [{user_interaction, false},
  235: 					{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  236:                                         {save_accepted_host, false}
  237:                                        ])) of
  238: 	{ok, _ChannelPid, Connection} ->
  239: 	    [{peer, {_HostName,{IPx,Portx}}}] = ssh:connection_info(Connection,[peer]),
  240: 	    ssh:close(Connection),
  241: 	    [{w2l, fun w2l/1},
  242:              {peer, {fmt_host(IPx),Portx}}, {group, openssh_server} | Config];
  243: 	{error,"Key exchange failed"} ->
  244: 	    {skip, "openssh server doesn't support the tested kex algorithm"};
  245: 	Other ->
  246:             ct:log("No openssh server. Cause:~n~p~n",[Other]),
  247: 	    {skip, "No openssh daemon (see log in testcase)"} 
  248:     end;
  249: 
  250: init_per_group(remote_tar, Config) ->
  251:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  252:     {Host,Port} =  proplists:get_value(peer, Config),
  253:     ct:log("Server (~p) at ~p:~p",[proplists:get_value(group,Config),Host,Port]),
  254:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  255:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  256:     Connection =
  257: 	case proplists:get_value(group, Config) of
  258: 	    erlang_server ->
  259: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port,
  260: 			    [{user, User},
  261: 			     {password, Passwd},
  262: 			     {user_interaction, false},
  263: 			     {silently_accept_hosts, true}]);
  264: 	    openssh_server ->
  265: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port,
  266: 			    [{user_interaction, false},
  267: 			     {silently_accept_hosts, true}])
  268: 	end,
  269:     [{remote_tar, true}, 
  270:      {connection, Connection} | Config];
  271: 
  272: init_per_group(write_read_tests, Config) ->
  273:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  274:     Config.
  275: 
  276: grps(Config) ->
  277:     proplists:get_all_values(
  278:       name, 
  279:       lists:flatten([proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[]),
  280: 		     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])])).
  281: 
  282: end_per_group(erlang_server, Config) ->
  283:     ct:comment("End ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  284:     Config;
  285: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  286:     ct:comment("End ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  287:     Config.
  288: 
  289: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  290: 
  291: init_per_testcase(sftp_nonexistent_subsystem, Config) ->
  292:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  293:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  294:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  295:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  296:     Sftpd = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  297: 				 {user_dir, PrivDir},
  298: 				 {subsystems, []},
  299: 				 {user_passwords,
  300: 				  [{User, Passwd}]}
  301: 				]),
  302:     [{sftpd, Sftpd} | Config];
  303: 
  304: init_per_testcase(version_option, Config0) ->
  305:     Config = prepare(Config0),
  306:     TmpConfig0 = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config),
  307:     TmpConfig = lists:keydelete(sftp, 1, TmpConfig0),
  308:     Dog = ct:timetrap(?default_timeout),
  309:     {_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config),
  310:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  311:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  312:     {ok, ChannelPid, Connection}  = 
  313: 	ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  314: 			       [{sftp_vsn, 3},
  315: 				{user, User},
  316: 				{password, Passwd},
  317: 				{user_interaction, false},
  318: 				{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  319:                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
  320:                                ]),
  321:     Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  322:     [{sftp,Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | TmpConfig];
  323: 
  324: init_per_testcase(Case, Config00) ->
  325:     Config0 = prepare(Config00),
  326:     Config1 = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config0),
  327:     Config2 = lists:keydelete(sftp, 1, Config1),
  328:     Dog = ct:timetrap(2 * ?default_timeout),
  329:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config0),
  330:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config0),
  331:     PktSzOpt = case proplists:get_value(pkt_sz, Config0) of
  332: 		   undefined -> [];
  333: 		   Sz -> [{packet_size,Sz}]
  334: 	       end,
  335:     Config =
  336: 	case proplists:get_value(group,Config2) of
  337: 	    erlang_server ->
  338: 		{_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config2),
  339: 		{ok, ChannelPid, Connection}  = 
  340: 		    ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  341: 					   [{user, User},
  342: 					    {password, Passwd},
  343: 					    {user_interaction, false},
  344: 					    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  345:                                             {save_accepted_host, false}
  346: 					    | PktSzOpt
  347: 					   ]
  348: 					  ),
  349: 		Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  350: 		[{sftp, Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | Config2];
  351: 	    openssh_server when Case == links ->
  352: 		{skip, "known bug in openssh"};
  353: 	    openssh_server ->
  354: 		Host = ssh_test_lib:hostname(),
  355: 		{ok, ChannelPid, Connection} = 
  356: 		    ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, 
  357: 					   [{user_interaction, false},
  358: 					    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  359:                                             {save_accepted_host, false}
  360: 					    | PktSzOpt
  361: 					   ]),
  362: 		Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  363: 		[{sftp, Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | Config2]
  364: 	end,
  365: 
  366:     case catch proplists:get_value(remote_tar,Config) of
  367: 	%% The 'catch' is for the case of Config={skip,...}
  368: 	true ->
  369: 	    %% Provide a ChannelPid independent of the sftp-channel already opened.
  370: 	    {ok,ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(proplists:get_value(connection,Config)),
  371: 	    [{channel_pid2,ChPid2} | Config];
  372: 	_ ->
  373: 	    Config
  374:     end.
  375: 
  376: end_per_testcase(sftp_nonexistent_subsystem, Config) ->
  377:     Config;
  378: end_per_testcase(rename_file, Config) ->
  379:     NewFileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  380:     file:delete(NewFileName),  
  381:     end_per_testcase(Config);
  382: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  383:     end_per_testcase(Config).
  384: 
  385: end_per_testcase(Config) ->
  386:     {Sftp, Connection} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  387:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Sftp),
  388:     catch ssh_sftp:stop_channel(proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config)),
  389:     ok = ssh:close(Connection).
  390: 
  391: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  392: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  393: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  394: open_close_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  395:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  396:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  397:     ct:log("FileName     = ~p~nSftpFileName = ~p", [FileName, SftpFileName]),
  398:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  399: 
  400:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  401:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  402:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write, creat]),
  403:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write, trunc]),
  404:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [append]),
  405:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read, binary]).
  406: 
  407: open_close_file(Server, File, Mode) ->
  408:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Server, File, Mode),
  409:     ok = ssh_sftp:close(Server, Handle).
  410: 
  411: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  412: open_close_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  413:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  414:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  415:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  416:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  417:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  418: 
  419:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:opendir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  420:     ok = ssh_sftp:close(Sftp, Handle),
  421:     {error, _} =  ssh_sftp:opendir(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  422: 
  423: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  424: read_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  425:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  426:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  427:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  428:     {ok, Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  429:     {ok, Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  430:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(FileName).
  431: 
  432: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  433: read_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  434:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  435:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  436: 
  437:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  438:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  439:     ct:log("sftp list dir: ~p~n", [Files]).
  440: 
  441: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  442: write_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  443:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  444:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  445:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  446:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  447:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  448:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [Data]),
  449:     {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName).
  450: 
  451: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  452: write_file_iolist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  453:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  454:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  455:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  456: 
  457:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  458:     DataB = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  459:     lists:foreach(
  460:       fun(D) ->
  461: 	      ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [D]),
  462: 	      Expected = try iolist_to_binary(D)
  463:                          catch _:_ -> unicode:characters_to_binary(D)
  464: 			 end,
  465: 	      {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName)
  466:       end,
  467:       [Data, [Data,Data], [[Data],[Data]], [[[Data]],[[[[Data]],Data]]],
  468:        [[[[Data]],Data],DataB],
  469:        [[[[Data]],Data],[[DataB],[[DataB]]]]
  470:       ]).
  471: 
  472: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  473: write_big_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  474:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  475:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  476:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  477: 
  478:     Data = [lists:duplicate(750000,"a"),
  479:             proplists:get_value(data, Config)],
  480:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  481:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  482:     {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName).
  483: 
  484: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  485: sftp_read_big_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  486:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  487:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  488:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  489: 
  490:     Data = [lists:duplicate(750000,"a"),
  491:             proplists:get_value(data, Config)],
  492:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  493:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  494:     {ok, Expected} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  495: 
  496: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  497: remove_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  498:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  499:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  500:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  501:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  502:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  503: 
  504:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  505:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), Files),
  506:     ok = ssh_sftp:delete(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  507:     {ok, NewFiles} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  508:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), NewFiles),
  509:     {error, no_such_file} = ssh_sftp:delete(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  510: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  511: rename_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  512:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  513:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  514:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  515:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  516:     NewFileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  517:     SftpNewFileName = w2l(Config, NewFileName),
  518: 
  519:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  520:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  521:     ct:log("FileName: ~p, Files: ~p~n", [FileName, Files]),
  522:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), Files),
  523:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(NewFileName), Files),
  524:     ok = ssh_sftp:rename(Sftp, SftpFileName, SftpNewFileName),
  525:     {ok, NewFiles} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  526:     ct:log("FileName: ~p, Files: ~p~n", [FileName, NewFiles]),
  527: 
  528:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), NewFiles),
  529:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(NewFileName), NewFiles).
  530: 
  531: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  532: mk_rm_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  533:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  534:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  535:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  536: 
  537:     DirName = filename:join(PrivDir, "test"),
  538:     SftpDirName = w2l(Config, DirName),
  539:     ok = ssh_sftp:make_dir(Sftp, SftpDirName),
  540:     ok = ssh_sftp:del_dir(Sftp, SftpDirName),
  541:     NewDirName = filename:join(PrivDir, "foo/bar"),
  542:     SftpNewDirName = w2l(Config, NewDirName),
  543:     {error, _} = ssh_sftp:make_dir(Sftp, SftpNewDirName),
  544:     {error, _} = ssh_sftp:del_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir).
  545: 
  546: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  547: links(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  548:     case os:type() of
  549: 	{win32, _} ->
  550: 	    {skip, "Links are not fully supported by windows"};
  551: 	_ ->
  552: 	    {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  553: 	    FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  554:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  555: 	    LinkFileName = proplists:get_value(linktest, Config),
  556:             SftpLinkFileName = w2l(Config, LinkFileName),
  557: 
  558: 	    ok = ssh_sftp:make_symlink(Sftp, SftpLinkFileName, SftpFileName),
  559: 	    {ok, FileName} = ssh_sftp:read_link(Sftp, SftpLinkFileName)
  560:     end.
  561: 
  562: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  563: retrieve_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  564:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  565:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  566: 
  567:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  568:     {ok, FileInfo} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  569:     {ok, NewFileInfo} = file:read_file_info(FileName),
  570: 
  571:     %% TODO comparison. There are some differences now is that ok?
  572:     ct:log("SFTP: ~p   FILE: ~p~n", [FileInfo, NewFileInfo]).
  573: 
  574: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  575: set_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  576:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  577:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  578: 
  579:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  580:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(FileName, write),
  581:     io:put_chars(Fd,"foo"),
  582:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#400}),
  583:     {error, eacces} = file:write_file(FileName, "hello again"),
  584:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#600}),
  585:     ok = file:write_file(FileName, "hello again").
  586: 
  587: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  588: file_owner_access(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  589:     case os:type() of
  590:         {win32, _} ->
  591:             {skip, "Not a relevant test on Windows"};
  592:         _ ->
  593:             FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  594:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  595:             {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  596: 
  597:             {ok, #file_info{mode = InitialMode}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, FileName),
  598: 
  599:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#000}),
  600:             {ok, #file_info{access = none}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  601: 
  602:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#400}),
  603:             {ok, #file_info{access = read}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  604: 
  605:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#200}),
  606:             {ok, #file_info{access = write}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  607: 
  608:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#600}),
  609:             {ok, #file_info{access = read_write}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  610: 
  611:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=InitialMode}),
  612: 
  613:             ok
  614:     end.
  615: 
  616: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  617: async_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  618:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  619: 
  620:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  621:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  622:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  623:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:aread(Sftp, Handle, 20),
  624: 
  625:     receive
  626: 	{async_reply, Ref, {ok, Data}} ->
  627: 	    ct:log("Data: ~p~n", [Data]),
  628: 	    ok;
  629: 	Msg ->
  630: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  631:     after 
  632: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  633:     end.
  634: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  635: async_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  636:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  637:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  638:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  639:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  640:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  641:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  642:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:awrite(Sftp, Handle, Data),
  643: 
  644:     receive
  645: 	{async_reply, Ref, ok} ->
  646: 	    {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName);
  647: 	Msg ->
  648: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  649:     end.
  650: 
  651: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  652: position(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  653:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  654:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  655:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  656: 
  657:     Data = list_to_binary("1234567890"),
  658:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  659:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  660: 
  661:     {ok, 3} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 3}),
  662:     {ok, "4"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  663: 
  664:     {ok, 10} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, eof),
  665:     eof = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  666: 
  667:     {ok, 6} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 6}),
  668:     {ok, "7"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  669: 
  670:     {ok, 9} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {cur, 2}),
  671:     {ok, "0"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  672: 
  673:     {ok, 0} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, bof),
  674:     {ok, "1"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  675: 
  676:     {ok, 1} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, cur),
  677:     {ok, "2"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1).
  678: 
  679: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  680: pos_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  681:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  682:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  683:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  684:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_pos, Config),
  685:     [Expect1,Expect2] = Es = [binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(D)) || D <- Data],
  686:     [Len1,Len2] = [length(E) || E <- Es],
  687:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  688: 
  689:     {ok,Read} = file:read_file(FileName),
  690:     ct:log("File: <~ts>~n<~p>~nExpect1: <~p>~nExpect2: <~p>", [Read, Read, Expect1, Expect2]),
  691: 
  692:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  693:     {async,Ref} = ssh_sftp:apread(Sftp, Handle, {bof, Len1}, Len2),
  694: 
  695:     receive
  696: 	{async_reply, Ref, {ok,Expect2}} ->
  697: 	    ok;
  698: 	Msg ->
  699: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  700:     after 
  701: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  702:     end,
  703: 
  704:    {ok,Expect1} = ssh_sftp:pread(Sftp, Handle, {bof,0}, Len1).
  705: 
  706: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  707: pos_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  708:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  709:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  710:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  711: 
  712:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  713: 
  714:     Data = list_to_binary("Bye,"),
  715:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [Data]),
  716: 
  717:     NewData = list_to_binary(" see you tomorrow"),
  718:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:apwrite(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 4}, NewData),
  719:     receive
  720: 	{async_reply, Ref, ok} ->
  721: 	    ok;
  722: 	Msg ->
  723: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  724:     after 
  725: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  726:     end,
  727: 
  728:     LastData = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  729:     ok = ssh_sftp:pwrite(Sftp, Handle, eof, LastData),
  730: 
  731:     NewData1 = unicode:characters_to_binary("Bye, see you tomorrow" ++ LastData),
  732:     {ok, NewData1} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  733: 
  734: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  735: start_channel_sock(Config) ->
  736:     LoginOpts =
  737: 	case proplists:get_value(group,Config) of
  738: 	    erlang_server -> 
  739: 		[{user,     proplists:get_value(user, Config)},
  740: 		 {password, proplists:get_value(passwd, Config)}];
  741: 	    openssh_server ->
  742: 		[] % Use public key
  743: 	end,
  744: 
  745:     Opts = [{user_interaction, false},
  746: 	    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  747:             {save_accepted_host, false}
  748: 	    | LoginOpts],
  749: 
  750:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(peer, Config),
  751: 
  752:     %% Get a tcp socket
  753:     {ok, Sock} = ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host, Port, [{active,false}]),
  754: 
  755:     %% and open one channel on one new Connection
  756:     {ok, ChPid1, Conn} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Sock, Opts),
  757:     
  758:     %% Test that the channel is usable
  759:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  760:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  761: 
  762:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [read]),
  763:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [write]),
  764: 
  765:     %% Try to open a second channel on the Connection
  766:     {ok, ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Conn, Opts),
  767:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [read]),
  768:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [read]),
  769: 
  770:     %% Test that the second channel still works after closing the first one
  771:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid1),
  772:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [write]),
  773:     
  774:     %% Test the Connection survives that all channels are closed
  775:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid2),
  776:     {ok, ChPid3} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Conn, Opts),
  777:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid3, SftpFileName, [write]),
  778:     
  779:     %% Test that a closed channel really is closed
  780:     {error, closed} = ssh_sftp:open(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [write]),
  781:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid3),
  782: 
  783:     %% Test that the socket is closed when the Connection closes
  784:     ok = ssh:close(Conn),
  785:     timer:sleep(400), %% Until the stop sequence is fixed
  786:     {error,_} = inet:getopts(Sock, [active]),
  787: 
  788:     ok.
  789: 
  790: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  791: sftp_nonexistent_subsystem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  792:     {_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config),
  793:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  794:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  795:     {error,"server failed to start sftp subsystem"} =
  796: 	ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  797: 			       [{user_interaction, false},
  798: 				{user, User},
  799: 				{password, Passwd},
  800: 				{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  801:                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
  802:                                ]).
  803: 
  804: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  805: version_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  806:     open_close_dir(Config).
  807: 
  808: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  809: create_empty_tar(Config) ->
  810:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  811:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  812:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  813:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  814:     erl_tar:close(Handle),
  815:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
  816:     {ok, #file_info{type=regular}} =
  817: 	ssh_sftp:read_file_info(ChPid, SftpTarFileName).
  818: 
  819: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  820: files_to_tar(Config) ->
  821:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  822:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  823:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  824:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  825:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  826:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose]),
  827:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("f2.txt",Config), "f2.txt", [verbose]),
  828:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  829:     chk_tar([F1, "f2.txt"], Config).
  830: 
  831: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  832: ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  833:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  834:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  835:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  836:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  837:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("f2.txt",Config), "f2.txt", [verbose]),
  838:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  839:     chk_tar(["f2.txt"], Config).
  840: 
  841: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  842: ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  843:     case proplists:get_value(tar_F3_txt, Config) of
  844: 	undefined ->
  845: 	    {skip, "Unicode test"};
  846: 	Fn ->
  847: 	    ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  848: 	    TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  849:             SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  850: 	    {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  851: 	    ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(Fn,Config), Fn, [verbose]),
  852: 	    ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  853: 	    chk_tar([Fn], Config)
  854:     end.
  855: 
  856: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  857: unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  858:     case proplists:get_value(tar_F4_txt, Config) of
  859: 	undefined ->
  860: 	    {skip, "Unicode test"};
  861: 	Fn ->
  862: 	    ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  863: 	    TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  864:             SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  865: 	    {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  866: 	    ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(Fn,Config), Fn, [verbose]),
  867: 	    ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  868: 	    chk_tar([Fn], Config)
  869:     end.
  870: 
  871: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  872: big_file_to_tar(Config) ->
  873:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  874:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  875:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  876:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]), 
  877:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose]),
  878:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  879:     chk_tar(["big.txt"], Config).
  880: 
  881: 
  882: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  883: files_chunked_to_tar(Config) ->
  884:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  885:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  886:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  887:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  888:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  889:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  890:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  891:     chk_tar([F1], Config).
  892: 
  893: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  894: directory_to_tar(Config) ->
  895:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  896:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  897:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  898:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  899:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("d1",Config), "d1", [verbose]),
  900:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  901:     chk_tar(["d1"], Config).
  902: 
  903: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  904: binaries_to_tar(Config) ->
  905:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  906:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  907:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  908:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  909:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  910:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  911:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  912:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}], Config).
  913: 
  914: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  915: null_crypto_tar(Config) ->
  916:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  917:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
  918:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  919:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,Bin} end,
  920:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  921:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  922:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  923:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  924:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  925:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  926:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  927:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  928:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose,{chunks,15000}]),
  929:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  930:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1, "big.txt"], Config).
  931: 
  932: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  933: simple_crypto_tar_small(Config) ->
  934:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  935:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _Size=6} end,
  936:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  937:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_Size=4} end,
  938:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
  939:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  940:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  941:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  942:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  943:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  944:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  945:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  946:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  947:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  948:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1], Config, [{crypto,{Cinit,Cdec}}]).
  949: 
  950: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  951: simple_crypto_tar_big(Config) ->
  952:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  953:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=6} end,
  954:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  955:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=4} end,
  956:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
  957:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  958:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  959:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  960:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  961:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  962:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  963:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  964:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  965:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose,{chunks,15000}]),
  966:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  967:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1, "big.txt"], Config, [{crypto,{Cinit,Cdec}}]).
  968: 
  969: stuff(Bin) -> << <<C,C>> || <<C>> <= Bin >>.
  970: 
  971: unstuff(Bin) -> << <<C>> || <<C,C>> <= Bin >>.
  972: 
  973: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  974: read_tar(Config) ->
  975:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  976:     NameBins = lists:sort(
  977: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
  978: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
  979: 		 ]),
  980:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  981:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  982:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  983:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
  984:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
  985:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
  986: 
  987:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config).
  988: 
  989: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  990: read_null_crypto_tar(Config) ->
  991:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  992:     NameBins = lists:sort(
  993: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
  994: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
  995: 		 ]),
  996:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
  997:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _FetchSize=42} end,
  998:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_SendSize=42*42} end,
  999:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_FetchSize=19} end,
 1000:     Cendw = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,Bin} end,
 1001:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1002:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1003: 
 1004:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1005:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1006:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1007:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1008:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1009:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1010: 
 1011:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1012: 
 1013: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1014: read_crypto_tar(Config) ->
 1015:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1016:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1017: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1018: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1019: 		 ]),
 1020:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
 1021:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _FetchSize=42} end,
 1022: 
 1023:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=42*42} end,
 1024:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_FetchSize=120} end,
 1025:     Cendw = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
 1026:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1027:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1028: 
 1029:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1030:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1031:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1032:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1033:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1034:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1035: 
 1036:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1037: 
 1038: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1039: block_size_16_crypto_tar(Config) -> cipher_crypto_tar(aes_256_cbc, Config).
 1040: block_size_1_crypto_tar(Config) -> cipher_crypto_tar(aes_256_ctr, Config).
 1041: 
 1042: cipher_crypto_tar(Cipher, Config) ->
 1043:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1044:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1045: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1046: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))},
 1047: 		  {"d1",fn("d1",Config)}  % Dir
 1048: 		 ]),
 1049:     Key = <<"This is a 256 bit key. Boring...">>,
 1050:     Ivec0 = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(16),
 1051: 
 1052:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, crypto:crypto_init(Cipher,Key,Ivec0,[{encrypt,true},
 1053:                                                                 {padding,zero}])} end,
 1054:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, crypto:crypto_init(Cipher,Key,Ivec0,false)} end,
 1055: 
 1056:     Cenc = fun(PlainBin,State) -> 
 1057: 		   CipherBin = crypto:crypto_update(State, PlainBin),
 1058: 		   {ok, CipherBin, State}
 1059: 	   end,
 1060:     Cdec = fun(CipherBin,State) ->
 1061: 		   PlainBin = crypto:crypto_update(State, CipherBin),
 1062: 		   {ok, PlainBin, State}
 1063: 	   end,
 1064: 
 1065:     Cendw = fun(PlainBin, State) ->
 1066:                     CipherBin1 = crypto:crypto_update(State, PlainBin),
 1067:                     Sz1 = size(CipherBin1),
 1068: 		    CipherBin2 = crypto:crypto_final(State),
 1069:                     Sz2 = size(CipherBin2),
 1070: 		    {ok, <<CipherBin1:Sz1/binary, CipherBin2:Sz2/binary>>}
 1071: 	    end,
 1072: 
 1073:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1074:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1075:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1076: 
 1077:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1078:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose]) || {Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1079:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1080: 
 1081:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1082:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1083: 
 1084: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1085: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1086: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1087: have_unicode_support() -> (file:native_name_encoding() == utf8) andalso ("四" == [22235]).
 1088: 
 1089: 
 1090: make_data_sub_dir(Config, SubDirSrc, SubDirDst) ->
 1091:     SrcDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1092:                            SubDirSrc
 1093:                           ),
 1094:     DstDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1095:                            SubDirDst),
 1096:     ssh_test_lib:copy_recursive(SrcDir, DstDir),
 1097:     {ok,DstDir}.
 1098:     
 1099: 
 1100: prepare(Config0) ->
 1101:     SrcDir = proplists:get_value(datadir_tar,Config0),
 1102:     DstDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config0), ssh_test_lib:random_chars(10)),
 1103:     ssh_test_lib:copy_recursive(SrcDir, DstDir),
 1104:     Keys = [filename,
 1105: 	    testfile,
 1106: 	    linktest,
 1107: 	    tar_filename],
 1108:     Config1 = foldl_keydelete(Keys, Config0),
 1109:     Config2 = lists:foldl(fun({Key,Name}, ConfAcc) ->
 1110:                                   [{Key, filename:join(DstDir,Name)} | ConfAcc]
 1111: 			  end,
 1112: 			  Config1,
 1113:                           lists:zip(Keys, [proplists:get_value(K,Config0) || K<-Keys])),
 1114: 
 1115:     catch ct:log("~p:~p Prepared filenames (Key -> Value):~n~ts",
 1116:                  [?MODULE,?LINE,
 1117:                   [io_lib:format("~p -> ~ts~n", [K,V]) || {K,V} <- Config2,
 1118:                                                           lists:member(K, Keys)]]),
 1119: 
 1120:     DataDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config2),
 1121:     FilenameSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "sftp.txt"),
 1122:     FilenameDst = proplists:get_value(filename, Config2),
 1123:     {ok,_} = file:copy(FilenameSrc, FilenameDst),
 1124:     [{sftp_priv_dir,DstDir} | Config2].
 1125: 
 1126: 
 1127: foldl_keydelete(Keys, L) ->
 1128:     lists:foldl(fun(K,E) -> lists:keydelete(K,1,E) end, 
 1129: 		L,
 1130: 		Keys).
 1131: 
 1132: 
 1133: chk_tar(Items, Config) ->
 1134:     chk_tar(Items, Config, []).
 1135: 
 1136: chk_tar(Items, Config, Opts) ->
 1137:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1138:     chk_tar(Items, TarFileName, Config, Opts).
 1139: 
 1140: chk_tar(Items, TarFileName, Config, Opts)  when is_list(Opts) ->
 1141:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1142:     tar_size(TarFileName, Config),
 1143:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
 1144:     {ok,HandleRead} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid, SftpTarFileName, [read|Opts]),
 1145:     {ok,NameValueList} = erl_tar:extract(HandleRead,[memory,verbose]),
 1146:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleRead),
 1147:     case {lists:sort(expand_items(Items,Config)), lists:sort(NameValueList)} of
 1148: 	{L,L} -> 
 1149: 	    true;
 1150: 	{Expect,Actual} -> 
 1151: 	    ct:log("Expect: ~p",[Expect]), ct:log("Actual: ~p",[Actual]),
 1152: 	    case erl_tar:table(TarFileName) of
 1153: 		{ok,Names} -> ct:log("names: ~p",[Names]);
 1154: 		Other -> ct:log("~p",[Other])
 1155: 	    end,
 1156: 	    ct:log("~s",[analyze_report(Expect, Actual)]),
 1157: 	    ct:fail(bad_tar_contents)
 1158:     end.
 1159: 
 1160: analyze_report([E={NameE,BinE}|Es], [A={NameA,BinA}|As]) ->
 1161:     if
 1162: 	NameE == NameA,
 1163: 	BinE =/= BinA-> 
 1164: 	    [["Component ",NameE," differs. \n  Expected: ",BinE,"\n  Actual: ",BinA,"\n\n"]
 1165: 	     | analyze_report(Es,As)];
 1166: 
 1167: 	NameE < NameA ->
 1168: 	    [["Component ",NameE," is missing.\n\n"]
 1169: 	     | analyze_report(Es,[A|As])];
 1170: 
 1171: 	NameE > NameA ->
 1172: 	    [["Component ",NameA," is not expected.\n\n"]
 1173: 	     | analyze_report([E|Es],As)];
 1174: 	true ->
 1175: 	    analyze_report(Es, As)
 1176:     end;
 1177: analyze_report([{NameE,_BinE}|Es], []) ->
 1178:     [["Component ",NameE," missing.\n\n"] | analyze_report(Es,[])];
 1179: analyze_report([], [{NameA,_BinA}|As]) ->
 1180:     [["Component ",NameA," not expected.\n\n"] | analyze_report([],As)];
 1181: analyze_report([], []) ->
 1182:     "".
 1183: 
 1184: tar_size(TarFileName, Config) ->
 1185:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1186:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
 1187:     {ok,Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(ChPid, SftpTarFileName),
 1188:     io:format('Tar file ~p is~n ~p bytes.~n',[TarFileName, size(Data)]).
 1189: 
 1190: expand_items(Items, Config) ->    
 1191:     lists:flatten(
 1192:       [case Item of
 1193: 	   {_Name,Bin} when is_binary(Bin) -> 
 1194: 	       Item;
 1195: 	   {Name,FileName} when is_list(FileName) ->
 1196: 	       read_item_contents(Name, fn(FileName,Config));
 1197: 	   FileName  when is_list(FileName) ->
 1198: 	       read_item_contents(FileName, fn(FileName,Config))
 1199:        end || Item <- Items]).
 1200: 
 1201: read_item_contents(ItemName, FileName) ->
 1202:     case file:read_file(FileName) of
 1203: 	{ok,Bin} ->
 1204: 	    {ItemName, Bin};
 1205: 	{error,eisdir} ->
 1206: 	    {ok,FileNames} = file:list_dir(FileName),
 1207: 	    [read_item_contents(filename:join(ItemName,Name),
 1208: 				filename:join(FileName,Name)) 
 1209: 	     || Name<-FileNames]
 1210:     end.
 1211: 
 1212: fn(Name, Config) ->
 1213:     Dir = proplists:get_value(datadir_tar, Config),
 1214:     filename:join(Dir,Name).
 1215: 
 1216: fmt_host({A,B,C,D}) -> lists:concat([A,".",B,".",C,".",D]);
 1217: fmt_host(S) -> S.
 1218: 
 1219: 
 1220: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1221: populate_non_unicode(Dir) ->
 1222:     file:delete("f1.txt"),
 1223:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"f3.txt"),
 1224:                          unicode:characters_to_binary("你好")),
 1225:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"F一.txt"),
 1226:                          unicode:characters_to_binary("你好")),
 1227:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"g四.txt"),
 1228:                          <<"How are you?">>).
 1229: 
 1230: w2l(P) ->
 1231:     ssh_test_lib:winpath_to_linuxpath(P).
 1232: 
 1233: w2l(Config, P) ->
 1234:     W2L = proplists:get_value(w2l, Config, fun(X) -> X end),
 1235:     W2L(P).
 1236: 
 1237:
